basics.name: Younghan Lee
basics.label: Postdoctoral Researcher
basics.summary: Ph.D. from Seoul National University who is interested in Security and Privacy in Artificial Intelligence

work.name: Department of AI∙Techno Convergence, Soongsil University
Department of Convergence Security Engineering, Sungshin Women's University
work.summary: Teaching Machine Learning-based Communication Networks Security

work.name: SOR Lab, Seoul National University
work.summary: Research interests include Security and Privacy in Artificial Intelligence

publications.name: FLGuard: Byzantine-Robust Federated Learning via Ensemble of Contrastive Models
publications.publisher: European Symposium on Research in Computer Security (ESORICS)
publications.summary: In this work, we propose FLGuard, a novel byzantine-robust FL method that detects malicious clients and discards malicious local updates by utilizing the contrastive learning technique, which showed a tremendous improvement as a self-supervised learning method.

publications.name: Exploring Clustered Federated Learning’s Vulnerability against Property Inference Attack
publications.publisher: Proceedings of the 26th International Symposium on Research in Attacks, Intrusions and Defenses
publications.summary: In this paper, we explore the potential risk of unintended property leakage in Clustered Federated Learning (CFL) by subjecting it to both passive and active Property Inference Attacks (PIAs).

publications.name: Precise extraction of deep learning models via side-channel attacks on edge/endpoint devices
publications.publisher: European Symposium on Research in Computer Security (ESORICS)
publications.summary: Our work provides a comprehensive understanding of such a relationship for the first time and would benefit future MEA studies in both offensive and defensive sides in that they may learn which pieces of information exposed by SCA are more important than the others.

publications.name: A Pilot Study of Machine Learning–Based Algorithms to Assist Integrated Care for Older Community-Dwelling Adults
publications.summary: Our study aims to explore the possibility of implementing machine learning decision-support algorithms in the integrated care of older community-dwelling adults.

publications.name: Learn2Evade: Learning-based generative model for evading PDF malware classifiers
publications.summary: We propose a variant of generative adversarial networks that generate evasive variant PDF malware (without any crash), which can be classified as benign by various existing classifiers yet maintaining the original malicious behavior.

publications.name: Hawkware: network intrusion detection based on behavior analysis with ANNs on an IoT device
publications.summary: In this paper, we propose a novel IDS named Hawkware, a lightweight ANN-based distributed NIDS that runs on an IoT device and analyzes the device's runtime behavior in tandem with its network traffic.

publications.name: Riskim: Toward complete kernel protection with hardware support
publications.publisher: Design, Automation & Test in Europe Conference & Exhibition (DATE)
publications.summary: In this paper, we introduce RiskiM, our new hardware-based monitoring platform to ensure kernel integrity from outside the host system.

publications.name: Mimicry resilient program behavior modeling with LSTM based branch models
publications.summary: In this paper, we report our preliminary findings in our research to build a mimicry resilient program behavior model that has lesser drawbacks.

projects.name: Research on Applying Machine Learning on Health and Nursing Data
Development of Intelligent Security Threat Countermeasure Solution based on Aritificial Intelligence
Development of Programmable IPs and Unified SDK to Enable Building Security-Integrated Computer Systems
Development of Cloud-based Intelligent Security Technology for Providing Customized Security Services
